Title: How to Handle Profits and People Problems
Description:
Today, we hear from:

•      A business owner wanting to scale and expand his auto-detailing company

•      A business owner sharing how he doubled his revenue in two years

•      An Instagram follower asking what it means to work on your business and not just in it

•      A son wondering the best ways to invest back into the family business

•      A family-business leader wondering how to handle a sexual harassment issue
